question: Which CYP genes' expression is decreased at the in vivo level following pomegranate juice consumption?
ideal_answer: It was found that pomegranate juice consumption decreased total hepatic CYP content as well as the expression of CYP1A2 and CYP3A.

snippets.text: It was found that pomegranate juice consumption decreased total hepatic CYP content as well as the expression of CYP1A2 and CYP3A.
